title: Clinical Practical Skills Enhancement: Foundations of Concrete Compressive Strength Prediction Using Ensemble Machine Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of intermediate-level courses in related fields or equivalent experience
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for medical/nursing field practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can explain the fundamental principles and application cases of ensemble machine learning (RFR, ABR).
Learners can implement a concrete compressive strength prediction model using Jupyter Notebook.
Learners can interpret model performance metrics (RMSE, R²) to select an optimal predictive model.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
